title: A Sunday in Dusty Hell: Riding with the EF Team Car on the Dirtiest Stage at the Tour de France
content:
Jeremy Whittle hitches a ride with EF Education-EasyPost on the craziest stage of the Tour de France. Here's his gripping inside-the-dust account:

Read the full article at A Sunday in Dusty Hell: Riding with the EF Team Car on the Dirtiest Stage at the Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
